text: Ruslan and Ludmila () is a 1972 Soviet fantasy-adventure movie directed by Aleksandr Ptushko.Абрикосов из рода Абрикосовых. Как правнук кондитера народным артистом сталРУСЛАН И ЛЮДМИЛА (1972) It stars Valeri Kozinets, Natalya Petrova, and Vladimir Fyodorov. ==Actors== * Valeri Kozinets as Ruslan (voiced by Feliks Yavorsky) * Natalya Petrova as Lyudmila (voiced by Nina Gulyaeva) * Vladimir Fyodorov as Chernomor the Wizard (voiced by Valery Nosik) * Maria Kapnist as Naina the Witch (as Maria Kapnist-Serko) * Andrei Abrikosov as Vladimir * Igor Yasulovich as Finn * Vyacheslav Nevinny as Farlaf * Oleg Mokshantsev as Rogdai * Ruslan Akhmetov as Ratmir * Sergey Martinson as Ambassador *Eve Kivi as fisherwoman *Valery Nosik as messenger == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1972 fantasy movies Category:1972 adventure movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies Category:Soviet adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Ptushko
title: Ruslan and Ludmila (movie)
